page.title: 17SANDY CARNIVAL
page.content: A POPULAR ANNUAL EVENT IN SANDY IS THE CARNIVAL WHICH USUALLY TAKES PLACE IN JUNE. MANY LOCAL BUSINESSES SPONSOR VARIOUS EVENTS TO PROVIDE A FULL WEEK OF ENTERTAINMENT FOR BOTH YOUNG AND OLD. THE FESTIVITIES ARE PRESIDED OVER BY THE CARNIVAL QUEEN, ACCOMPANIED BY A CARNIVAL PRINCE AND PRINCESS. A PROCESSION OF FLOATS THROUGH THE TOWN HERALDS THE BEGINNING OF CARNIVAL WEEK. ALL THE FLOATS ARE DECORATED ON A COMMON THEME. FLOATS ARE ENTERED IN THE PROCESSION BY DIFFERENT ORGANISATIONS AND SCHOOLS, WITH TROPHIES BEING AWARDED IN VARIOUS CATEGORIES. THROUGH THE GENEROUS SUPPORT OF THE PEOPLE OF SANDY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF MONEY IS RAISED FOR LOCAL CHARITIES.
